name: Merry Christmas From Horace
overview: Guide Horace to collect all of the Christmas presents. Use keyboard or Kempston joystick to move Horace left, right and jump. Avoid being hit by the usual enemies, Snow Balls and snow flakes. If possible, try to jump onto the nasty to knock them down. This game has 49 levels of progressive game play. Simply collect the presents as they fall while avoiding the enemies. Collect twenty presents per level before the time is up. Collect the bell to release the bonuses. Watch out for the Elves!
